scripts.ci-build: yarn production-compile && yarn generate-licenses && yarn copy-katex && zola build && yarn minify && yarn postcss && yarn unique-css && yarn unique-js
scripts.unique: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/main.css public/main-$DATE.css && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/main\.css/main-$DATE.css/" {} +
scripts.unique-css: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/main.css public/main-$DATE.css && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/main\.css/main-$DATE.css/" {} +
scripts.unique-js: export DATE=$(date +%s) && mv public/js/main.js public/js/main-$DATE.js && find public -name '*.html' -exec sed -i "s/js\/main\.js/js\/main-$DATE.js/" {} +
scripts.production-compile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.prod.config.js && tsc ts/compress.ts
scripts.domain: sed -i "s/base_url\s=\s\".*\"$/base_url = \"https:\/\/$DOMAIN\"/" config.toml && sed -i "s/base_domain\s=\s\".*\"$/base_domain = \"$DOMAIN\"/" config.toml && sed -i "s/\"start_url\":\s\".*\"/\"start_url\": \"https:\/\/$DOMAIN\"/" static/images/logo/site.webmanifest && echo "Formatted for domain $DOMAIN"
